item.description:
Hachi: A Dog's Tale(Hachiko: A Dog's Story)2009G93 minutesWhen his master dies, a loyal pooch named Hachiko keeps a regular vigil -- for more than a decade -- at the train station where he once greeted his owner every day in this touching drama based on a true story.


Cast:Richard Gere, Joan Allen, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Sarah Roemer, Jason Alexander, Erick Avari, Davenia McFadden, Robbie Sublett, Kevin DeCoste, Bates WilderDirector:Lasse Hallstr√∂mGenres:Drama, Dramas Based on Real Life, Family Dramas, Tearjerkers, Blu-rayThis movie is:Emotional, Sentimental, Understated

Vegetarian dinner at 7pm to 8pm

Movie and analysis starts at 8pm

$25, sliding scale to $20, $5 off without food

Please give me as much advanced notice of probable attendance and whether you will be eating.

Herb Pearce, host and discussion leader is an Enneagram personality types expert, is a therapist for individuals, couples and families and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, Herb's Tips for living and soon to be Enneagram for Advanced Students.

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Dinner and Personality Types at the Movies - Hachi: A Dog's Tale
